titleStmt.title: An Account how the Earl of Essex killed himself in the Tower of London, the 13th of July 1683 as it appears by the coroners inquest and the several informations following.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill ... and by Henry Hills and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: The official report, signed by the coroner at end: E. Farnham.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
